relationships.description: Harry plans to hide at Grimmauld Place, as mentioned in the text: 'Hermione, where else is there? It's the best chance we've got. Snape's only one Death Eater. If I've still got the Trace on me, we'll have whole crowds of them on us wherever else we go.'
Ron clicks the Deluminator to release the café's light, as mentioned in the text: 'While she unlocked the café door, Ron clicked the Deluminator to release the café’s light.'
